scripts.start: echo "Error: Wrong folder, run `cd ./frontend` then `npm install`" && exit 1
scripts.preinstall: echo "Error: Wrong folder, run `cd ./frontend` then `npm install`" && exit 1
scripts.start:backend: cd ./backend && cross-env NODE_PATH=../frontend/node_modules/ ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development dotnet watch run
